de.systemagmbh.tools.io.mail
Class CSysBase64

java.lang.Object
  de.systemagmbh.tools.io.mail.CSysBase64
public final class CSysBase64
extends Object

The class CSysBase64 provides BASE64 encoding and decoding. BASE64 encoding is specified in RFC 2045 - MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Needed by smtp mail attachments, but useful for other things too.

Version:
$Revision: 1.3 $
Author:
Christian Wohanka
